idea: Docville is an IoT tech-enabled assisted telemedicine platform that has eliminated the need for patients to visit the doctor's clinic. Through our hi-tech kit and innovative service delivery model a Specialist is able to accurately diagnose and treat patients remotely.
name: Docville Healthcare Pvt Ltd

idea: Joma India EV Private Limited is in its nascent stage and is engaged in providing Electrical Vehicle Charging Solutions to Corporates , Government and consumers. It has designed and developed a DC Fast Charger, D4 Super charger, AC wallbox, etc. which is in Its final stages of certification/approval from Automotive research association of India situated in Pune. Post approval company intends to manufacture all the products at a large scale and cater to the demands of rapidly rising Electric Vehicles market in India.
name: JOMA INDIA EV PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Basically, we are solving a problem of home-improvements sector whose market size is USD 800 million in 2018 to around USD 1,120 million by 2025, according to a 2019 Global Market Insights.
There is a huge gap between customer and manufacturer because this sector has been a very unorganized since initial days.
A serious effort in this sector can generate a huge revenue for our country so we are.
Just for an example of revenue related to this which can help in country's growth; In America a home-improvements company,  Home Depot only annual revenue for 2021 was $132.11B, a 19.85% increase from 2020. Home Depot annual revenue for 2020 was $110.225B, a 1.87% increase from 2019.
So a serious effort in this field can generate a large revenue.
Materialbuy.com
name: MATERIALBUY BUILD CARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Patient centric community platform giving end to end holistic cancer treatment solutions. Your CancerMitr is with you, every step of the way.

Our Vision

To be the largest cancer community.

First in India. Then, globally.

Our Mission

To save Lives.

One to Many.

Our Approach

From Discovery to Recovery

3 simple steps

1. Plan your treatment

2. Book a centre around you

3. Track your journey

Awareness

We help you understand your cancer journey.

You get personalized cancer treatment plans by the best cancer care team.

Our patient counsellors walk the entire journey with you.

Affordability

We save your time, effort and money.

Our pre-negotiated most economical packages and solutions help reduce your financial burden.

Our patient counsellors provide financial assistance

Accessibility

We help you get treatment on time.

You can get your treatment done from any of our community partners â€“ in and around the comforts of your home. Our patient counsellors guide you to the best centres around you.
name: ARNAM IMPACT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We at Profut Qaunt are engaged in developing the highest quality trading signals through proprietary research and deploy various financial strategies focused on market inefficiencies across a variety of assets, utilizing a proprietary research platform and risk management process.
